entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
